originalText.text: I've been coming to Trim & Proper for 2 years now. Best barbershop. Every one of the barbers is great and they take care of my hair perfectly. The West Village location is really nice. It's tucked away from the noise and is a relaxing place to get a hot towel shave and come out looking fresh

text.text: I've been coming to Trim & Proper for 2 years now. Best barbershop. Every one of the barbers is great and they take care of my hair perfectly. The West Village location is really nice. It's tucked away from the noise and is a relaxing place to get a hot towel shave and come out looking fresh

originalText.text:
I have been a member of Trim and Proper for about a year now and it is one of the best decisions I have made.I  was in search of a hair stylist/barber that knew how to work with long curly hair for men but it was becoming difficult and way above my price range for those that advertised their experience with my hair type. I discovered Trim and Proper through one of my searches and contacted the owner who explained their business model and I scheduled an appointment with Ben through their app, which you can schedule as many as you need. Ben is attentive, patient, gregarious, funny and extremely skilled in his craft. He knows how to work and style hair according to what  you want but also makes suggestions what  looks good on you.  I can’t maintain my natural curly look without him. I have received numerous compliments. Ben is the best.

I highly recommend Trim and Proper.

originalText.text: Marcus gave me a haircut in the middle of the day. I had no idea who he was, but by the way he dressed and the way he presented his business just made me feel comfortable so I took a chance and I was not disappointed. This is a very upscale barbershop and I had no idea one existed. Keep being great trim and proper.

originalText.text: Love Trim and Proper! So easy to book, salon-quality service at barbershop prices, and the West Village location is so convenient if you’re off the ACE or 123 lines. Used the service for a couple years now and Ben is the man (book him!) but I’ve never been disappointed with a cut from anyone here.

Used the service for a couple years now and Ben is the man (book him!) but I’ve never been disappointed with a cut from anyone here.

originalText.text: Great team at a great location. I’ve been trying to find a consistent and enjoyable barber throughout my several years in the city and Trim & Proper has become my go-to for over a year now. Ben and the team at the west village location always make me feel welcome and have me leaving looking & feeing good.
